mods:mods.mods:abstract: Miscellaneous law papers from the Inferior Court of Common Pleas, Albany; the New Jersey Supreme Court; Richmond County Court of Common Pleas; Westchester Court of Common Pleas. New York Supreme Court and Mayor's Court for which, among others, Kissam, Chambers, and Murray served as attorney. Papers from the following cases are included: Jeremiah Van Rensselaer and Peter Winne vs. Jacobus Van Alen; Peter Van Etten et al. vs. Jacob Rutsen et al.; Margery Merritt et al. vs. John Corbett; the King vs. Henry Beekman et al., Justices of the Peace of Dutchess County; Patrick Campbell vs. James Wallace; James Darcey vs. Daniel Stratford; John Brestead vs. Johannes Degroot; Agreement between Gilbert Livingston and Robert G. Livingston; Nathaniel Garrisson vs. John Hunlock; Richard Stilwell vs. Lawrence Smith; Becker and Benson vs. James Haviere; Cassell vs. Waddel; William Nicoll Jr. vs. Timothy Milles; Clapp vs. Van Horne; William Vesey vs. Walford Aker; James Darcey vs. estate of James Wilson; Johnson vs. Samuel Samuelse Demarest; Nathaniel Gilbert vs. the Mayor et al of New York City; James Jackson vs. Dirck Vasburgh. Other papers included are: Petition to Governor George Clinton from John Chambers, et al., a writ to sheriffs for the election of representatives; paper concerning Alexander Detorry, slave belonging to Thomas Clarke; paper concerning admission of Helena Peers to court.
mods:mods.mods:note: The entire content of the original has been digitized.
mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: For rights relating to this resource, visit http://www.columbia.edu/cu/lweb/digital/jay/copyright.html

mods:recordInfo.mods:recordOrigin: Derived from John Jay Papers metadata and edited in general conformance to MODS Guideline (Version 3).
